general.gigTitle: do website development as full stack web developer, backend frontend developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Modern UI UX Design Expert for Website and Mobile App
sellerCard.description: Greetings! My name is Abdullah Maruf. I have over 6 years of experience as an Android and iOS developer with a strong focus on UI/UX design and integrating backend APIs. Leading a team of experts and experienced, I ensure that every app I create delivers a seamless and delightful user experience. My passion for innovation and the latest tech helps me build apps with features and speed designed just for your users' needs. Ready to transform your idea into a cutting-edge app? Let's chat!

description.content:
Are you seeking an experienced full stack web developer who develops websites from scratch with the frontend and backend that provides you end-to-end service?


Your one-stop solution is here!


With extensive experience in website development, I will create dynamic and robust sites or web applications. My expertise is crafting customized websites on any scale (small, medium, large) that fulfill your needs. I will develop your website using the latest technologies like react.js, PHP, Laravel, and many more.


My Services:


  • Full Stack Website Develop from Scratch
  • Customizing Existing Sites
  • Unique Frontend Design
  • Responsive and Compatible Design
  • Manageable Backend (Admin Panel)
  • Secured Web Site & Database
  • Rest API Integration
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Payment Gateways Integration


Technologies I Specialize in:


Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Next JS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap

Backend: PHP Laravel, Node JS, Express JS

Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MySQL


Why Me:


  • Fast Delivery
  • Quality of Work
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Clean and Commented Code


Got questions? Shoot! I'm here to chat about your project and ensure it's executed flawlessly. Let's make it happen.

slide.name: do website development as full stack web developer, backend frontend developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to design my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need your Webflow login credentials and some initial instructions to get started. You need to provide the design files(figma, sketch or reference websites), logos, photos, text, fonts, and other relevant files.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide help or revisions after the job has been completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am providing 30 days of ongoing support to you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the website be mobile friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Without a doubt. Responsive services are included in all packages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is the price fixed or negotiable?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I believe in a personalized approach to pricing. First, let's discuss the specific challenges your website is facing. Once I understand your needs, I'll provide you with a tailored solution and a fair quote that aligns with the project's scope.

packageList.title: Standard Custom Website
packageList.description: Custom 1 Page Website Design & Development or Figma to Frontend

packageList.title: Professional Custom Website
packageList.description: Upto 5 Pages Design & Development from Figma to React, Nextjs

packageList.title: Premium Business Website
packageList.description: Upto 8 Pages for startup business + Provided API Integration + Firebase Integration

reviews.comment: The results speak for themselves! The website is stunning, functional, and exactly what we wanted. His expertise and dedication were evident every step of the way. 🙏

seller_response.comment: I truly appreciate your confidence in my work. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future.

reviews.comment: I was impressed by how easy it was to work with him. He delivered exactly what I needed with zero complaints and incredible attention to detail. Highly recommended!

seller_response.comment: I truly appreciate your confidence in my work. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future.

reviews.comment: He ensured every little detail was taken care of. I was kept in the loop at every stage of the project. Very reliable and efficient.

seller_response.comment: I'm glad that you're finding a great benefit to my services. Wish you the best of luck and much success.

reviews.comment: He created an amazing website from just a basic brief and took the initiative to make thoughtful improvements. Very happy with the result. 🙏

seller_response.comment: Working with you was a breeze! Thank you for making it such a smooth process.

reviews.comment: I was truly impressed by the care the developer invested in the project. Every detail was thoughtfully addressed, and the final outcome matched my expectations perfectly.
